games.name: Fortnite
games.description: A popular battle royale game where players fight to be the last one standing.

games.name: Minecraft
games.description: A sandbox game where players can build and explore their own worlds.

games.name: League of Legends
games.description: A multiplayer online battle arena game where players compete in teams.

games.name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
games.description: A first-person shooter game where teams of terrorists and counter-terrorists compete.

games.name: Among Us
games.description: A multiplayer game where players work together to complete tasks while impostors try to sabotage them.

games.name: Roblox
games.description: A platform where players can create and play games created by other users.

games.name: Rocket League
games.description: A game where players play soccer with rocket-powered cars.

games.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
games.description: A life simulation game where players can build and manage their own island.

games.name: Super Mario Odyssey
games.description: A platform game where Mario travels across various worlds to rescue Princess Peach.

games.name: Splatoon 3
games.description: A third-person shooter game where players use ink to cover territory and defeat opponents.

games.name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
games.description: A racing game where players race against each other using characters from the Mario series.

games.name: Pokemon Sword/Shield
games.description: A role-playing game where players catch and train Pokemon to become the champion.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening
games.description: An action-adventure game where players control Link to save the island of Koholint.

games.name: Minecraft Dungeons
games.description: An action-adventure game set in the Minecraft universe where players explore dungeons and fight monsters.

games.name: Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville
games.description: A third-person shooter game where players control plants or zombies in various game modes.

games.name: Cuphead
games.description: A run-and-gun game with a unique 1930s cartoon art style.

games.name: Overwatch 2
games.description: A team-based first-person shooter game where players choose from a roster of heroes with unique abilities.

games.name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted
games.description: A virtual reality game where players must survive the night in a haunted pizzeria.

games.name: Disney Dreamlight Valley
games.description: A life simulation game where players can interact with Disney characters and build their own village.

games.name: Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga
games.description: An action-adventure game where players can experience the Star Wars saga in Lego form.
